Description:
Adversaries may search for private key certificate files on compromised systems for insecurely stored credential

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Private Keys Reconnaissance Via CommandLine Tools
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%.key%' or command like '%.pgp%' or command like '%.gpg%' or command like '%.ppk%' or command like '%.p12%' or command like '%.pem%' or command like '%.pfx%' or command like '%.cer%' or command like '%.p7b%' or command like '%.asc%') and ((command like '%dir %' and (process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and original_file_name = 'cmd.exe')) or (((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and command like '%get-childitem %') or (process_path like '%\findstr.exe' and original_file_name = 'findstr.exe')))
